id: Let the past remain in the past.

onSuccess.displayText:
Hearing the truth laid bare before him, {Player} knew that some questions about his past might never be answered, but he would not compromise the kingdom’s future.

Seeing the forlorn face of her child, Queen {Queen#Name} pulled {Player} into her embrace as she did many times before.

”It’s alright my dear,” The queen consoled,”There may come a chance in the future where your questions will be answered.“
choices: ”The needs of the kingdom outweigh the needs of the one”
